name: Luxinnovation
goal: Luxinnovation is an organisation that contributes to the economic development of Luxembourg by fostering innovation, fuelling international growth and attracting foreign direct investment.
interests: Budget, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Luxinnovation covers all Horizon 2020 programme committees and is the Luxembourg Horizon 2020 National Contact Point. Moreover, Luxinnovation's Head of EU Liaison is following very closely FP9 developments.
